title: Hammered Nina Small Hoops
description: Yes, hoops are an everyday essential. And this pair is anything but ordinary. Crafted in 100% recycled 18k gold vermeil and then hammered for a shimmered effect, our small Nina hoops are a cut above the rest…and they’re designed to last. Gold vermeil is sterling silver layered with a thick layer of 18k gold, which is much higher quality than standard gold plating.
details: Crafted from 100% recycled 18K Gold VermeilLength: 13.8MMWidth 1.8MMDiameter: 14.66MMSet of twoEthically sourced in Thailand
